Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Freezer \Freez"er\, n. One who, or that which, cools or freezes, as a refrigerator, or the tub and can used in the process of freezing ice cream. [1913 Webster]
freezer n : electric refrigerator (trade name Deepfreeze) in which food is frozen and stored for long periods of time [syn: {deep-freeze}, {Deepfreeze}, {deep freezer}]
